mapper.select: select b.employee_id, b.employee_name, b.mobile, b.entry_time, c.name as deptName, d.city, d.scheme_name, a.personal_insurance_amount, a.personal_provident_fund_amount, a.corporate_insurance_amount, a.corporate_provident_fund_amount from wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on b.dept_id = c.dept_id left join wk_hrm_insurance_scheme d on a.scheme_id = d.scheme_id where a.month = #{data.month} and a.year = #{data.year}

select a.employee_id, a.employee_name, a.post, c.`name` as deptName from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on a.dept_id = c.dept_id where a.employee_id not in (select b.employee_id from wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record b where i_record_id = #{iRecordId} and status = 1) and is_del = 0 and (a.entry_status not in (2, 4) or (a.entry_status = 4 and adddate(b.plan_quit_time, interval 6 month) > #{dateTime}))
